thread.title: 20-Vehicle Accident Reported On I-79 In Butler County
thread.title_full: 20-Vehicle Accident Reported On I-79 In Butler County

author: CBS Pittsburgh
title: 20-Vehicle Accident Reported On I-79 In Butler County
text:
20-Vehicle Accident Reported On I-79 In Butler County March 3, 2017 12:54 PM Photo Credit: Thinkstock 
SLIPPERY ROCK (KDKA) â€” A multi-vehicle crash was reported on Interstate 79 Friday afternoon. 
State police in Butler County said northbound I-79 was restricted to a single lane before the Slippery Rock exit due to a crash involving 20 vehicles. 
A police report states that one crash quickly escalated into multiple due to the location of the crash combined with white-out conditions. 
Several vehicles became stuck in the median in order to avoid the pileup.
